title: Chickens pt 3:  Microorganism to Microcosm to Microeconomy
description:
We begin with a CDC warning about salmonella in backyard chickens and what their approach to this topic reveals about our present food and medical system. Then we consider a time when our government counted on us to have productive home economies. We explore how chickens can again fit into the home and local community.
CDC Got a backyard flock? Here’s how to prevent Salmonella: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PbVilkMzvBU
NC State Univ. -- Yeast A Solution to Salmonella in Poultry: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YwuG4Apk-7c 
Frontiers in Veterinary Medicine -- Chicken Gut Microbiota https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fvets.2018.00254/full
NIH Biotech Info Library -- A Review of Prebiotics Against Salmonella in Poultry: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6104193/ 
Help feed yourself poster: http://nwedible.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/backyard-chickens-1917-e1374777111449-471x700.jpg
Uncle Sam Hens and Chickens poster: https://www.treehugger.com/green-home/raising-chickens-patriotic-duty-uncle-sam-says-so.html
